mapper.select: SELECT aa.menu_nm, aa.up_menu_nm, bb.program_path AS path FROM (SELECT a.up_menu_id, a.menu_nm, b.menu_nm AS up_menu_nm, a.menu_id, a.order_no, b.up_ord_no, a.program_no FROM (SELECT * FROM system_menu_mst WHERE lev = 3 and use_yn = 'Y') a JOIN (SELECT menu_id, up_menu_id, menu_nm, program_no, order_no AS up_ord_no FROM system_menu_mst WHERE up_menu_id = #{up_menu_id} AND use_yn = 'Y') b ON a.up_menu_id = b.menu_id) aa JOIN (SELECT a.program_no, a.program_path FROM (SELECT * FROM system_program_mst WHERE use_yn = 'Y') a JOIN (SELECT * FROM system_program_user WHERE user_no = #{sess_user_no}) b ON a.program_no = b.program_no) bb ON aa.program_no = bb.program_no ORDER BY up_ord_no, order_no

select aa.user_no, email as email, if(name is null, '', name) as name from (select * from bike_user_mst where status = '101-001' and user_no not in (select b.user_no from (select * from system_program_mst where program_id = #{pgm_id}) a join system_program_user b on a.program_no = b.program_no)) aa join bike_user_info bb on aa.user_no = bb.user_no

select c.user_no, email, if(name is null, '', name) as name, read_wrt as read_wrt_code, comm_nm as read_wrt from (select * from system_program_mst where program_id = #{pgm_id}) a join system_program_user b on a.program_no = b.program_no join bike_user_mst c on b.user_no = c.user_no join bike_user_info d on c.user_no = d.user_no join (select * from com_comm_mst where up_comm_cd = '002') auth on b.read_wrt = auth.comm_cd where c.status = '101-001';
select b.program_id from (select * from system_menu_mst where menu_id = #{menu_id} and lev = 3 and use_yn = 'Y') a join system_program_mst b on a.program_no = b.program_no where b.use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT menu_id, menu_nm FROM (SELECT A.menu_id, A.menu_nm, B.order_no AS f_order_no, A.order_no AS s_order_no FROM (SELECT * FROM system_menu_mst WHERE lev = 3 AND use_yn= 'Y') A JOIN (SELECT * FROM system_menu_mst WHERE up_menu_id= #{menu_position} AND lev = 2 AND use_yn = 'Y') B ON A.up_menu_id = B.menu_id) AA ORDER BY AA.f_order_no, AA.s_order_no

SELECT a.menu_nm, b.menu_nm AS up_menu_nm, c.program_id as pgm_id, c.program_path as path FROM (SELECT * FROM system_menu_mst WHERE lev = 3 and use_yn = 'Y') a JOIN (SELECT menu_id, up_menu_id, menu_nm, program_no, order_no AS up_order_no FROM system_menu_mst WHERE up_menu_id = 'L_MENU' AND use_yn = 'Y') b ON a.up_menu_id = b.menu_id left outer JOIN (SELECT program_no, program_id, program_path FROM system_program_mst WHERE use_yn = 'Y') c ON a.program_no = c.program_no ORDER BY up_order_no, order_no
